entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 06:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 10.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 9.4°C
Wind: SE 31 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
